languages.text: "Отряд сопровождения докладывает, что госпожа аколит и часть ее свиты погибла в чудовищной аномалии, а наши люди понесли тяжелые потери, но продолжают движение".
"The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."
languages.original_text: "Отряд сопровождения докладывает, что госпожа аколит и часть ее свиты погибла в чудовищной аномалии, а наши люди понесли тяжелые потери, но продолжают движение".

traits.locale_text: "The escort troop reports that the lady acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly and our people have suffered heavy losses, but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort troop reports that the lady acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly and our people have suffered heavy losses, but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort squad reports that the lady acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort squad reports that the lady acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."
"The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

languages.text: “小队报告说，探索过程中爆发了可怕的异象，薛女士与她的部分随行人员在这场事故中丧了命。我们的人损失惨重，但仍在继续前进。”
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: “小队报告说，探索过程中爆发了可怕的异象，薛女士与她的部分随行人员在这场事故中丧了命。我们的人损失惨重，但仍在继续前进。”
“小队报告说，探索过程中爆发了可怕的异象，这位女侍仆与她的部分随从在这场事故中丧了命。我们的人损失惨重，但仍在继续前进。”

languages.text: «El escuadrón escolta informa de que la acólita y parte de su séquito han muerto en una terrible anomalía, y que los nuestros han sufrido grandes pérdidas, pero siguen avanzando a pesar de todo».
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: «El escuadrón escolta informa de que la acólita y parte de su séquito han muerto en una terrible anomalía, y que los nuestros han sufrido grandes pérdidas, pero siguen avanzando a pesar de todo».

languages.text: 「護衛部隊は、アコライトとその従者の何人かが恐ろしいアノマリーで死亡したことで、我が兵は大きな損害を被ってはいるものの、前進を続けていると報告しています」
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛部隊は、女性のアコライトとその従者の何人かが恐ろしいアノマリーで死亡したことで、我が兵は大きな損害を被ってはいるものの、前進を続けていると報告しています」
「護衛部隊は、女性のアコライトとその従者の何人かが恐ろしいアノマリーで死亡したことで、我が兵は大きな損害を被ってはいるものの、前進を続けていると報告しています」

languages.text: « L'escorte rapporte que l'acolyte et une partie de sa suite ont succombé à une anomalie terrifiante. Nos troupes ont subi de lourdes pertes, mais poursuivent malgré tout. »
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: « L'escorte rapporte que l'acolyte et une partie de sa suite ont succombé à une anomalie terrifiante. Nos troupes ont subi de lourdes pertes, mais poursuivent malgré tout. »

languages.text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass die Akolythin und ein Teil ihres Gefolges in einer grauenhaften Anomalie ums Leben gekommen sind. Unsere Leute haben schwere Verluste erlitten, rücken aber dennoch weiter vor.
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass die Akolythin und ein Teil ihres Gefolges in einer grauenhaften Anomalie ums Leben gekommen sind. Unsere Leute haben schwere Verluste erlitten, rücken aber dennoch weiter vor.

"Die Eskorte berichtet, dass die Lady Akolythin und ein Teil ihres Gefolges in einer grauenhaften Anomalie ums Leben gekommen sind. Unsere Leute haben schwere Verluste erlitten, rücken aber dennoch weiter vor."

languages.text: "Refakatçi manga; havari ile maiyetinin bir kısmının korkunç bir anomali yüzünden can verdiklerini, bizim askerlerimizin ise yüksek bir zayiat verdikleri hâlde ilerlemeyi sürdüklerini raporluyor."
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that the acolyte and some of her retinue have died in a horrifying anomaly, and that our people have suffered heavy losses but keep advancing nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Refakatçi manga; havari ile maiyetinin bir kısmının korkunç bir anomali yüzünden can verdiklerini, bizim askerlerimizin ise yüksek bir zayiat verdikleri hâlde ilerlemeyi sürdüklerini raporluyor."
